title: Are you really a blink of BLACKPINK if you dislike a member? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm a firm believer in you being allowed to dislike someone but like the group they're part of. As long as you're not disrespectful, it's fine to not like members equally. For comparison, ask if you're a Blink if you have a bias. No one has an issue with biases yet most people with s bias acknowledge there's a trait that they dislike of other members or traits that cause them to not Stan them as much as their bias. So yeah, you're a fan even if you don't like a member. You're not a fan if you bash that member
